Plot: Attempting to cope with her mother's murder, Sidney and her horror movie-obsessed friends are stalked by a murderer who seems to have a hard time letting the past go.
Title: Scream
Actors: Drew Barrymore, Roger Jackson, Kevin Patrick Walls, David Booth
tomatoConsensus: Horror icon Wes Craven's subversive deconstruction of the genre is sly, witty, and surprisingly effective as a slasher film itself, even if it's a little too cheeky for some.
